spreads isotope label heavy light into two columns

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_AnalysisConfiguration.R
spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel.Rd

spreads isotope label heavy light into two columns

spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel(resData, config)

See also

Other configuration: AnalysisConfiguration, AnalysisParameters, AnalysisTableAnnotation, INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, R6extractValues(), complete_cases(), make_interaction_column(), make_reduced_hierarchy_config(), sample_subset(), separate_factors(), separate_hierarchy(), setup_analysis(), table_factors()

Examples

library(LFQService)
setNa <- function(x){ifelse(x < 100, NA, x)}
bb <- LFQServiceData::skylinePRMSampleData_A
configur <- bb$config_f()
data <- bb$analysis(bb$data, configur)

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases

data %>% dplyr::mutate(Area = setNa(Area)) -> data
x<-spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel(data,configur)
head(x)

#> # A tibble: 6 x 9
#>   Replicate.Name Time  protein_Id peptide_Id precursor_Id fragment_Id sampleName
#>   <chr>          <chr> <chr>      <chr>      <chr>        <chr>       <chr>     
#> 1 12_S165049_09~ T8    CiRT stan~ ATAGDTHLG~ ATAGDTHLGGE~ ATAGDTHLGG~ T8        
#> 2 12_S165049_09~ T8    CiRT stan~ ATAGDTHLG~ ATAGDTHLGGE~ ATAGDTHLGG~ T8        
#> 3 12_S165049_09~ T8    CiRT stan~ ATAGDTHLG~ ATAGDTHLGGE~ ATAGDTHLGG~ T8        
#> 4 12_S165049_09~ T8    CiRT stan~ ATAGDTHLG~ ATAGDTHLGGE~ ATAGDTHLGG~ T8        
#> 5 12_S165049_09~ T8    CiRT stan~ ATAGDTHLG~ ATAGDTHLGGE~ ATAGDTHLGG~ T8        
#> 6 12_S165049_09~ T8    CiRT stan~ ATAGDTHLG~ ATAGDTHLGGE~ ATAGDTHLGG~ T8        
#> # ... with 2 more variables: light_Area <dbl>, light_Detection.Q.Value <dbl>

bb <- LFQServiceData::skylineSRM_HL_A
configur <- bb$config_f()
data <- bb$analysis(bb$data, configur)

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases

bb <- LFQServiceData::skylineSRM_HL_A
conf <- bb$config_f()
analysis <- bb$analysis(bb$data, bb$config_f())

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases
x <- spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel(analysis, conf)
head(x[,5:ncol(x)])

#> # A tibble: 6 x 8
#>   peptide_Id precursor_Id fragment_Id sampleName heavy_annotatio~ heavy_Area
#>   <chr>      <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                 <dbl>      <dbl>
#> 1 EGAFVELFH~ EGAFVELFHEI~ EGAFVELFHE~ lowG~p06             0.0293    1617574
#> 2 EGAFVELFH~ EGAFVELFHEI~ EGAFVELFHE~ lowG~p06             0.0293     404924
#> 3 EGAFVELFH~ EGAFVELFHEI~ EGAFVELFHE~ lowG~p06             0.0293     830326
#> 4 EGAFVELFH~ EGAFVELFHEI~ EGAFVELFHE~ lowG~p06             0.0293     773545
#> 5 EGAFVELFH~ EGAFVELFHEI~ EGAFVELFHE~ lowG~p06             0.0293     476888
#> 6 FVSPLSWDL~ FVSPLSWDLVG~ FVSPLSWDLV~ lowG~p06             0.0383    1575740
#> # ... with 2 more variables: light_annotation_QValue <dbl>, light_Area <dbl>
